decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in acordance with Policies 4.1, 5.5 and 5.9 of the Adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' (2004). | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance  with Policies 4.1, 5.5 and 5.9 of the Adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' (2004).
description: Ground floor extension (conservatory) to rear of house, together with covered walkway/storage area to side/rear
